You all need to let me know if I'm barking up the wrong mailing list for th=
is.

I'm trying to get all my junit tests in a suite to run, even if there =
are one or more failures/errors.
Afterwards, I want the build to fail if th=
ere were any failures or errors.

When I added this: haltonerror=3D"yes" ha=
ltonfailure=3D"yes" 
to my <junit> tag in my ant file, no tests in my suite=
 run after the first error/failure.
This also forced me into using a <tryca=
tch> to make sure my <junitreport> runs if there's an error failure :-(.
If=
 I remove these two attributes, the build doesn't fail if there were errors=
/failures.

Any suggestions?

Thanks in advance for any help.

Erik O.
